Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 59 Filed 10/05/20 Page 1 of 1

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT
SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK
---------------------------------------------------------------x
UNITED STATES OF AMERICA

v.

GHISLAINE MAXWELL,
Defendant.
---------------------------------------------------------------x
To the Clerk of Court and all parties of record:

PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that the undersigned attorney admitted to practice in this Court hereby appears as counsel for Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell in the above-captioned action.

Dated: October 3, 2020

/s/ Bobbi C. Sternheim

BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ.
Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim
33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor
New York, NY 10011
212-243-1100

DOJ-OGR-00001778
